title: Beginning Microsoft Visual Studio LightSwitch Development
description:
Beginning Microsoft Visual Studio LightSwitch Development

Learn how LightSwitch can accelerate and simplify application development
As MicrosoftÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s newest offering for simplifying application development, LightSwitch opens the development door to creating applications without writing code.
